title: She always loved you = Siempre lo amo [Destinos Pt 2: Ep 52]
subject_group: Advertising, Film, Journalism, Mass Media & TV/Foreign language films
description: Episode number 52 of Series "Destinos: an introduction to Spanish. Pt. 2". Episode 52: The final episode in which no new vocabulary or grammar is introduced. All the loose ends of the story are resolved. Don Fernado can rest peacefully knowing the whereabouts of his long lost family and love. The factory is saved, Juan will be reunited with Pati and Carlos has the trust of his family. Most importantly, Raquel and Arturo embark on a life together filled with the promise of much love and happiness.
related_objects: Series; S01216; Destinos: an introduction to Spanish. Pt. 2; Active; 1992
